title: The All-New Race Face Turbine Pedal
content:
Race Face just announced its all-new Turbine Pedal, which isn’t for everyone. This new pedal platform is for those who demand the most secure, locked-in ride quality on flat pedals. Check out more below…

Turbine Pedal Quick Hits

  • Large, secure platform: 115mm L x 110mm W
  • 3mm Dual-Axis Concavity: Grip in every plane
  • 11 height-adjustable pins per side: Bottom-mounted for easy removal
  • 20mm max platform thickness (excluding pin height)
  • 6061 aluminum machined body: Durable and lightweight
  • No bearing bump: Improved ergonomics
  • Rebuildable and serviceable internals
  • 419g per set
  • Seven color options: Black, Silver, Kashmoney, Purple, Orange, Red, and Blue
  • Turbine Pedals MSRP: $180.00 USD / $220.00 CAD / 199 EUR SRP / $295 AUD

This redesigned Turbine pedal features a 3mm deep concavity making it the most concave pedal platform on the market. This design cradles the foot in a secure pocket, locking it in place while maintaining comfort and support. This is because the Turbine pedal’s chassis is concave in all directions — front to back and inboard to outboard.

All in, the new Turbine pedal is 17% more concave, 27g lighter, and only 5% thicker than the closest competition.

Turbine also features:

  • Asymmetric Pedal Platform: Designed to better interface with the shape of a rider’s foot, wider at the front for maximum support and grip while offering improved ground clearance.
  • No Bearing Bump: Thanks to a bushing inboard and a ball bearing outboard, Turbine eliminates the bearing bulge seen in some pedals. This results in a larger effective platform and a tighter stance for better pedaling ergonomics.
  • Extensive Lab Testing: One million cycles with no signs of wear — Turbine’s internals are built to last, are fully rebuildable, and are covered by a lifetime warranty
